Blog.post: Just monkey testing this site. Wanna see what date has come? Hey guys, don't make it fully knowledge-based. Let it be 50% knowledge( jokes, tricks and anecdotes) & 50% educational stuff also. Bye bye

Have a nice time posting messages into this site. If you have something worth sharing, Please make sure that all of us are aware of that information. If you have something not worth sharing, please have some mercy on us and dont post that message. Boy if I see some crap, Remember I am not too far from you and any time I can reach you. Waiting for some useful information. Bye for now.

I wish all the 53 young virtusans a grand success in their projects Last 7 weeks of training has been exciting and we learned a lot of technical stuff and earned a lot of buddies So let us show the same spirit in our new experiences and show all of them that First training Batch of Chennai ATC really made a Difference...........

friends , these 2 months were just wonderful .we were like a family and now that we are moving into our du's we cannot have all sorts of fun we had these days.just make sure that we meet offline very often and conyinue our funs.. do post ur comments
Hi guys & gals, Nice to have this forum keep updating our knowledge using this as a Knowlegde Management Forum for us.... Post as many questions to get clarified...

Just copy and install SharpReader from urlLink \\md-vishwack\aggregator and subscribe to this page urlLink http://virtusa.blogspot.com/atom.xml enjoy this kool technology.. and we'll keep this site up.. post in as many messages as possible and keep up ur writing skills.
Letz rock in and have a nice time. bye
This has been a great experience in blog so far, because i dont know anything about it, if anyone knows please reply to this post
